reference.title: Setting delta node recovery
reference.shortdesc: The REST request to add a node to a cluster uses the /controller/addNode endpoint URI.

section.title: Delta node recovery REST API
section.p: Performing a POST on the /controller/setRecoveryType sets the type of recovery. It's progress can be tracked just like rebalance. After the data is persisted to disk and replicas are up-to-date, the node is put into the failed over state.

row.entry: Sets the recovery type to be performed for a node. Options are delta or full.

section.title: Error codes
section.codeblock: 200 // Request succeeded 400 // recoveryType and/or otpNode could not be understood by the server 404 // The cluster is running in a pre-3.0 compatibility mode and thus cannot satisfy the request
